channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins P4 Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins P4 Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21655|2024-08-03T18:23:27.403Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20p4%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins P4 Plugin 1.11.4 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified Perforce server using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2021-21654|2024-08-03T18:23:27.372Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20p4%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins P4 Plugin 1.11.4 and earlier does not perform permission checks in multiple HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified Perforce server using attacker-specified username and password.
